scripts.build:timestamp: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const timestamp = new Date().toLocaleString('en-FI', { timeZone: 'Europe/Helsinki', year: 'numeric', month: '2-digit', day: '2-digit', hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' }); const content = `export const buildTimestamp = '${timestamp}';\n`; fs.writeFileSync(path.join('shared', 'src', 'buildInfo.ts'), content, 'utf8');"
scripts.build: npm run build:timestamp && npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
